attributes.title: Fyne Ales Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

 Based at the head of Loch Fyne, brewing started on St Andrew's Day 2001.  Ales include Piper’s Gold and Maverick.  All bottled beers are bottle-conditioned.

attributes.name: Fyne Ales Brewery
attributes.1: Strachur, Argyll and Bute PA27 8, UK
